author: Gino D'Acampo
method: Drizzle the olive oil over the slices of ciabatta bread. Heat a chargrill pan until smoking and toast the bread for 1-2 minutes on both sides, or until golden-brown all over. Remove from the pan and rub the clove garlic onto one side of each slice of toast.  Mix together the tomato, basil, watercress and remaining oil in a bowl, season with salt and freshly ground black pepper and pile onto the ciabatta toasts. Serve immediately.
ingredients: 2 slices ciabatta bread,  4 tbsp olive oil,  1 clove garlic, peeled,  1 tomato, chopped,  6 fresh basil leaves, torn,  1 handful watercress, chopped,  salt and freshly ground black pepper
